positions.subtitle: Tata Consultancy Services
positions.description: ROLE:●	Developed and maintained software applications using Java, Spring boot, MySQL, APIs, JS, HTML, XML and diverse range of technologies.●	Gathered and analyzed client requirements and develop comprehensive frontend and backend solutions, ensuring alignment with client objectives and deadlines.●	Developed GST calculation system adhering to government standards also integrated payment calculation methods, which includes VAS, customs, insurance charges, etc., to enhancing product offerings and client satisfaction.●	Integrated UPI Payment method using REST API of PayU which facilitates users to conduct online payments through UPI QR codes, also apply various functionalities within the system.●	Designed Custom Declaration Forms and Consolidated Receipts using HTML and Java.●	Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving skills and a steadfast commitment to delivering top-tier software solutions.RESPONSIBLE:●	Overseeing code implementation, code review, build, and enhancements.●	Managing deployment and release management of applications across PAN India.
positions.title: Software Developer
positions.description_html:
ROLE:
● Developed and maintained software applications using Java, Spring boot, MySQL, APIs, JS, HTML, XML and diverse range of technologies.
● Gathered and analyzed client requirements and develop comprehensive frontend and backend solutions, ensuring alignment with client objectives and deadlines.
● Developed GST calculation system adhering to government standards also integrated payment calculation methods, which includes VAS, customs, insurance charges, etc., to enhancing product offerings and client satisfaction.
● Integrated UPI Payment method using REST API of PayU which facilitates users to conduct online payments through UPI QR codes, also apply various functionalities within the system.
● Designed Custom Declaration Forms and Consolidated Receipts using HTML and Java.
● Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving skills and a steadfast commitment to delivering top-tier software solutions.
RESPONSIBLE:
● Overseeing code implementation, code review, build, and enhancements.
● Managing deployment and release management of applications across PAN India.

positions.subtitle: Tata Consultancy Services
positions.description: It was 4 months training in different fields. Did a full fledged Python Flask Web development Project from scratch to Deployment at the end of the training.1. Got trained and Hands-on Experience in Python, Java core and Web development.2. Got trained in some digital technologies Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning Basics.3. Got trained and Hands-on Experience in Cyber Security domain(Web application Penetration Testing, Some Ethical Hacking concepts).4. Got to learn some tools related to DevOps and DevSecOps, i.e. Git and also learned some web application Penetration testing tools i.e. Burp suite and ZAP.
positions.title: TCS Ignite Trainee
positions.description_html:
It was 4 months training in different fields. Did a full fledged Python Flask Web development Project from scratch to Deployment at the end of the training.

1. Got trained and Hands-on Experience in Python, Java core and Web development.

2. Got trained in some digital technologies Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning Basics.

3. Got trained and Hands-on Experience in Cyber Security domain(Web application Penetration Testing, Some Ethical Hacking concepts).

4. Got to learn some tools related to DevOps and DevSecOps, i.e. Git and also learned some web application Penetration testing tools i.e. Burp suite and ZAP.
